name: dynamicportfolio
description: Dynamic Portfolio is a web application that allows users to generate their own portfolio websites. With this application, users can easily create and customize their portfolio sites, and share them on their resumes and other platforms.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build_check: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
